attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop illegal immigrants claiming benefits, these people claim the benfits that the uk tax payer pays. we would not have so many immigrants if we did not pay them benefits. if they manage to get into england, when they 'sign on' they should be deported and not allowed to claim assylum

rejection.details: Illegal immigrants are not able to claim benefits.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
